backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing departments, semesters, subjects, resources, and user profiles with admin-protected CRUD and public read access.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking app features to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing major frontend files, components, and feature modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the site's design system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, and routes for all major pages including admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Route guard enforcing Internet Identity login and admin checks before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/Department: Admin UI for CRUD operations on departments, semesters, and subjects using dialogs and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResourceMa: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting resources with department-semester-subject selection and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing copyright, branding, and link to caffeine.ai with dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Top navigation bar with logo, nav links, admin visibility logic, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/resources/EmptyS: Simple empty-state card displaying an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Filter panel allowing keyword, department, semester, subject, and resource-type selection.
Displays a list of resources with type badges, optional context labels, and external open links.
frontend/src/features/admin/resourceMuta: React Query mutations wrapping actor calls to add, edit, and remove resources with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/admin/structureMut: React Query mutation hooks for adding, editing, and removing departments, semesters, and subjects, each invalidating the departments query.
frontend/src/features/admin/useAdminStat: Provides a query to check whether the current authenticated user is an admin.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSea: Utility to filter resources by keyword, structural filters, and derived resource type.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: React Query hook to fetch all departments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity login, identity loading, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark UI themes.
frontend/src/lib/resourceType.ts: Infers a resource type from its title or URL using keyword matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page with tabs for managing resources and structure, protected by an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Browse UI for navigating departments, semesters, and subjects with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons to browse or search study materials.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Search interface that flattens catalog resources and filters them by keyword and selected academic criteria.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Displays a subjectâ€™s resources with breadcrumb navigation and handles loading or missing subject states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, assets, and current development state.
